sense.def:
A receipt
je dokument, ki potrjuje, da je podpisnik prejel denar ali blago.

seg.quote: Give students a written receipt for each payment.

sense.def:
Denar, ki ga prejmejo v trgovini ali gledališču, se pogosto imenuje
receipts
.

seg.quote: The receipts from admission fees fell sharply.

sense.def:
The receipt of something
je prejetje nečesa;

seg.quote: You have to sign here and acknowledge receipt.
